theorem exists_le_inscribed_triangle_area {A B C X Y Z : EuclideanGeometry.Point} :
  EuclideanGeometry.Collinear {B, C, X} →

  EuclideanGeometry.Collinear {A, B, Z} →

   EuclideanGeometry.area B X Z ≤ EuclideanGeometry.area X Y Z ∨
   EuclideanGeometry.area C Y X ≤ EuclideanGeometry.area X Y Z) :=
begin
  intros hBCX hCAY hABZ,
  -- proof omitted for brevity
end

  Let area := EuclideanGeometry.area in
  area A Z Y ≤ area X Y Z ∨
  area B X Z ≤ area X Y Z ∨
  area C Y X ≤ area X Y Z :=
sorry

theorem exists_area_le {A B C X Y Z : EuclideanGeometry.Point} :
  ∃ (T : EuclideanGeometry.Triangle),
    (T = EuclideanGeometry.triangle A Z Y ∨ T = EuclideanGeometry.triangle B X Z ∨ T = EuclideanGeometry.triangle C Y X) ∧
    EuclideanGeometry.area T ≤ EuclideanGeometry.area (EuclideanGeometry.triangle X Y Z) :=

end

```lean
∀ {P : Type} [inst : EuclideanGeometry P] {A B C X Y Z : P},
  X ∈ LineSegment ℝ B C → Y ∈ LineSegment ℝ C A → Z ∈ LineSegment ℝ A B →
  let area := EuclideanGeometry.area in
  area A Z Y ≤ area X Y Z ∨ area B X Z ≤ area X Y Z ∨ area C Y X ≤ area X Y Z
```
